content.en: Shale gas algorithms: Algorithms are being used to address various research questions related to shale gas reservoirs. These questions include developing new well testing models, analyzing the performance of composite models, understanding the decline behavior of fractured wells, and analyzing the production performance of multiple fractured horizontal wells. By utilizing algorithms, researchers are able to incorporate multiple mechanisms, consider different flow mechanisms, and improve the understanding of these complex reservoirs.
content.da: Skifergas-algoritmer: Algoritmer bliver brugt til at besvare forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til skifergasreserver. Disse spørgsmål inkluderer udvikling af nye brøndtestmodeller, analyse af kompositmodelers ydeevne, forståelse af nedgangsopførsel for frakturerede brønde og analyse af produktionsydelse af flere frakturerede horisontale brønde. Ved at anvende algoritmer er forskere i stand til at inkorporere flere mekanismer, overveje forskellige strømningmekanismer og forbedre forståelsen af disse komplekse reserver.
